item.title: LightRAG - [EMNLP2025] "LightRAG: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation"
item.description: [EMNLP2025] "LightRAG: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation"<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> retrieval, RAG, augmented | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (GitHub)

item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> reasoning, LLM, vector, retrieval, RAG | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>

item.title: Hybrid unary-binary design for multiplier-less printed Machine Learning classifiers
item.description: arXiv:2509.15316v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Printed Electronics (PE) provide a flexible, cost-efficient alternative to silicon for implementing machine learning (ML) circuits, but their large feature sizes limit classifier complexity. item.title: Kuramoto Orientation Diffusion Models
item.description: arXiv:2509.15328v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Orientation-rich images, such as fingerprints and textures, often exhibit coherent angular directional patterns that are challenging to model using standard generative approaches based on isotropic Euclidean diffusion.
